00055 using System;
00056 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00057 
00058 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00059 {
00068     public sealed class TriangularDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00069     {
00070         double _a;
00071         double _b;
00072         double _c;
00073         double _diff, _lowerPart, _upperPart, helper3, helper4;
00074 
00075         #region Construction
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080         public
00081         TriangularDistribution()
00082             : base()
00083         {
00084             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0, 0.5);
00085         }
00086 
00095         public
00096         TriangularDistribution(
00097             RandomSource random
00098             )
00099             : base(random)
00100         {
00101             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0, 0.5);
00102         }
00103 
00108         public
00109         TriangularDistribution(
00110             double lowerLimit,
00111             double upperLimit,
00112             double center
00113             )
00114             : base()
00115         {
00116             SetDistributionParameters(lowerLimit, upperLimit, center);
00117         }
00118         #endregion
00119 
00120         #region Distribution Parameters
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124 
00125 
00126         public double LowerLimit
00127         {
00128             get { return _a; }
00129             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _b, _c); }
00130         }
00131 
00137         public double UpperLimit
00138         {
00139             get { return _b; }
00140             set { SetDistributionParameters(_a, value, _c); }
00141         }
00142 
00148         public double Center
00149         {
00150             get { return _c; }
00151             set { SetDistributionParameters(_a, _b, value); }
00152         }
00153 
00157         public
00158         void
00159         SetDistributionParameters(
00160             double lowerLimit,
00161             double upperLimit,
00162             double center
00163             )
00164         {
00165             if(!IsValidParameterSet(lowerLimit, upperLimit, center))
00166             {
00167                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00168             }
00169 
00170             _a = lowerLimit;
00171             _b = upperLimit;
00172             _c = center;
00173 
00174             _diff = upperLimit - lowerLimit;
00175             _lowerPart = center - lowerLimit;
00176             _upperPart = upperLimit - center;
00177             this.helper3 = Math.Sqrt(this._lowerPart * this._diff);
00178             this.helper4 = Math.Sqrt(upperLimit - center);
00179         }
00180 
00187         public static
00188         bool
00189         IsValidParameterSet(
00190             double lowerLimit,
00191             double upperLimit,
00192             double center
00193             )
00194         {
00195             return lowerLimit < upperLimit && lowerLimit <= center && center <= upperLimit;
00196         }
00197         #endregion
00198 
00199         #region Distribution Properties
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203         public override double Minimum
00204         {
00205             get { return _a; }
00206         }
00207 
00211         public override double Maximum
00212         {
00213             get { return _b; }
00214         }
00215 
00219         public override double Mean
00220         {
00221             get { return (_a + _b + _c) / 3.0; }
00222         }
00223 
00227         public override double Median
00228         {
00229             get
00230             {
00231                 if(_c >= 0.5 * _diff)
00232                 {
00233                     return _a + Math.Sqrt(0.5 * _diff * _lowerPart);
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 return _b - Math.Sqrt(0.5 * _diff * _upperPart);
00237             }
00238         }
00239 
00243         public override double Variance
00244         {
00245             get { return (_a * _a + _b * _b + _c * _c - _a * _b - _a * _c - _b * _c) / 18.0; }
00246         }
00247 
00251         public override double Skewness
00252         {
00253             get
00254             {
00255                 double a = Constants.Sqrt2 * (_a + _b - 2 * _c) * (2 * _a - _b - _c) * (_a - 2 * _b + _c);
00256                 double b = 5.0 * Math.Pow(_a * _a + _b * _b + _c * _c - _a * _b - _a * _c - _b * _c, 1.5);
00257                 return a / b;
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00264         public override
00265         double
00266         ProbabilityDensity(
00267             double x
00268             )
00269         {
00270             if(x <= _a)
00271             {
00272                 return 0.0;
00273             }
00274 
00275             if(x <= _c)
00276             {
00277                 return 2 * (x - _a) / (_diff * _lowerPart);
00278             }
00279 
00280             if(x < _b)
00281             {
00282                 return 2 * (_b - x) / (_diff * _upperPart);
00283             }
00284 
00285             return 0.0;
00286         }
00287 
00291         public override
00292         double
00293         CumulativeDistribution(
00294             double x
00295             )
00296         {
00297             if(x <= _a)
00298             {
00299                 return 0.0;
00300             }
00301 
00302             if(x <= _c)
00303             {
00304                 double diff = x - _a;
00305                 return diff * diff / (_diff * _lowerPart);
00306             }
00307 
00308             if(x < _b)
00309             {
00310                 double diff = _b - x;
00311                 return 1.0 - diff * diff / (_diff * _upperPart);
00312             }
00313 
00314             return 1.0;
00315         }
00316         #endregion
00317 
00318         #region Generator
00319 
00320 
00321 
00322 
00323         public override
00324         double
00325         NextDouble()
00326         {
00327             double genNum = this.RandomSource.NextDouble();
00328             if(genNum <= _lowerPart / _diff)
00329             {
00330                 return _a + Math.Sqrt(genNum) * this.helper3;
00331             }
00332             else
00333             {
00334                 return _b - Math.Sqrt(genNum * _diff - _lowerPart) * this.helper4;
00335             }
00336         }
00337         #endregion
00338     }
00339 }
